divs: Sighting Detailsi just got into ufo's about maybe a month and a half ago and started meditating a couple of weeks ago i only say this because i know some people say that that might have something to do with ufo"s anyway i was outside hitting the tennis ball against the wall when i thought i saw a star in the top of my peripheral vision i turned around to get the tennis ball when i suddenly realized this could be i immediately turned around and i think it was in different spot but im not sure anyway when i turned around it was moving a little faster than a plane and it looked like two orbs stuck together and it also had an outside aura like thingy and it sorda looked like a sideways egg i guess. and it was moving pretty steadily when i turned around i did it to call my dad and right before the 2 or 3 time i turned around it got extremely bright and i IMMEDIATELY turned around and it was gone.
